# Product.PurchaseResult.pending

**Case**

The purchase is pending, and requires action from the customer.

## Declaration

```swift
case pending
```

## Discussion

If a pending purchase succeeds, StoreKit delivers the resulting [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction] in the transaction [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/updates].

## Getting the Purchase Results

- **Product.PurchaseResult.success(_:)**: The purchase succeeded and results in a transaction.
- **Product.PurchaseResult.userCancelled**: The user canceled the purchase.
